member.summary: True whenever a conversion is running and False when the results have been transferred to the data registers.

member.name: P:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.DeviceStatus.ImageUpdating
member.summary: True when the NVM data is being copied to images registers and False when the copying is done. The data is copied at power-on-reset and before every conversion.

member.summary: IIR filter coefficient. The higher the coefficient, the slower the sensors responds to external inputs.

member.summary: Filter coefficient of 0.

member.summary: Filter coefficient of 1.

member.summary: Filter coefficient of 3.

member.summary: Filter coefficient of 7.

member.name: F:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.FilteringMode.Bme680FilteringMode.C15
member.summary: Filter coefficient of 15.

member.name: F:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.FilteringMode.Bme680FilteringMode.C31
member.summary: Filter coefficient of 31.

member.name: F:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.FilteringMode.Bme680FilteringMode.C63
member.summary: Filter coefficient of 63.

member.name: F:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.FilteringMode.Bme680FilteringMode.C127
member.summary: Filter coefficient of 127.

member.name: T:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.FilteringMode.Bmx280FilteringMode
member.summary: Bmx280 devices feature an internal IIR filter.
member.remarks:
This filter effectively reduces the bandwidth of the temperature and pressure output signals and increases the resolution of the pressure and temperature output data to 20 bits.
The higher the coefficient, the slower the sensors responds to external inputs.
See the data sheet with recommended settings for different scenarios.

member.name: F:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.FilteringMode.Bmx280FilteringMode.Off
member.summary: Filter off.

member.name: F:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.FilteringMode.Bmx280FilteringMode.X2
member.summary: Coefficient x2.

member.name: F:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.FilteringMode.Bmx280FilteringMode.X4
member.summary: Coefficient x4.

member.name: F:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.FilteringMode.Bmx280FilteringMode.X8
member.summary: Coefficient x8.

member.name: F:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.FilteringMode.Bmx280FilteringMode.X16
member.summary: Coefficient x16.

member.name: T:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.PowerMode.Bme680PowerMode
member.summary: Sensor power mode.

member.name: F:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.PowerMode.Bme680PowerMode.Sleep
member.summary: No measurements are performed.

member.name: F:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.PowerMode.Bme680PowerMode.Forced
member.summary: Single TPHG cycle is performed.
member.remarks: Sensor automatically returns to sleep mode afterwards. Gas sensor heater only operates during gas measurement.

member.name: T:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.PowerMode.Bmx280PowerMode
member.summary: Sensor power mode.

member.name: F:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.PowerMode.Bmx280PowerMode.Sleep
member.summary: No operations, all registers accessible, lowest power mode, selected after startup.

member.name: F:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.PowerMode.Bmx280PowerMode.Forced
member.summary: Perform one measurement, store results, and return to sleep mode.

member.name: F:Iot.Device.Bmxx80.PowerMode.Bmx280PowerMode.Normal
member.summary: Perpetual cycling of measurements and inactive periods. This interval is determined by the combination of IIR filter and standby time options.
